description: run-script-os is a tool that will let you use generic npm script commands that will pass through to os specific commands.

name: run-script-os

scripts.example: echo '0. Call either npm test, npm run test, or npm run-script test and check out the output to see how pre and post commands work with run-script-os'
scripts.posttest: echo '6. Posttest (Generic) is finally called after all of the OS specific commands are called'
scripts.pretest: echo '1. Pretest (Generic) called first when running npm test'
scripts.test: echo '2. Test (Generic) runs transitioning to OS specific code' && run-script-os
scripts.test-error:linux: echo 'Run $? afterwards to confirm the error code is propagating appropriately.' && exit 11
scripts.test-error:win32: echo 'Run $LASTEXITCODE (PowerShell) or %errorlevel% (CMD) afterwards to confirm the error code is propagating appropriately.' && exit 22
